name: 高淩菁
objective: 本課程的重點在於闡述統計學之基本概念，主要的內容涵蓋三個領域：敘述統計、機率理論與推論統計，其中包含概念介紹、敘述統計、機率理論、推論統計。另有統計學的應用領域於推論未知的情況以作為相關決策之依據，並包含統計軟體使用介紹。
schedule:

1	2/17	 Class recess
2	2/24	 Ch 8. Confidence Interval Estimation
3	3/3	 Ch 8. Confidence Interval Estimation
4	3/10	 Ch 9. Fundamentals of Hypothesis Testing:One-Sample Tests
5	3/17	 Ch 9. Fundamentals of Hypothesis Testing: One-Sample Tests
6	3/24	 Exam 1
7	3/31	 Ch 10. Two-Sample Tests
8	4/7	 Ch 10. Two-Sample Tests
9	4/14	 Ch 11. Analysis of Variance
10	4/21	 Ch 11. Analysis of Variance
11	4/28	 Exam 2
12	5/5	 Ch 12. Chi-Square Tests and Nonparametric Tests
13	5/12	 Ch 12. Chi-Square Tests and Nonparametric Tests
14	5/19	 Ch 13. Simple Linear Regression
15	5/26	 Ch 13. Simple Linear Regression
16	6/2	 Class recess
17	6/9	 Ch 14. Introduction to Multiple Regression
18	6/16	 Exam 3
scorePolicy:
In-class quiz: 15% 	Homework: 10%	Exam 1: 25%	
Exam 2: 25%	Final Exam: 25%
